headSection.text:
Our platform connects tenants and owners, eliminating 
 the need for intermediaries and high commissions.

section-grid.header-title: The top-rated applicants will apply to your property
section-grid.header-description: We will show you the top three candidates who applied for your property, pre-screened beforehand.

card-static-carrusel.title: More than 140,000 people choose
card-static-carrusel.description: Our clients choose us for the transparency and simplicity in the rental process.

array-user.description-1: I am delighted with my experience using Reffindr. I needed to rent my property quickly, and thanks to the platform, I found the perfect tenant in a few days.
array-user.description-2: Reffindr exceeded my expectations. I found a reliable and committed tenant in less than a week.
array-user.description-3: I own several properties, and Reffindr has become my number one ally for renting them. The customer support is exceptional, and the system is very intuitive. I highly recommend it.
array-user.description-4: The experience with Reffindr has been incredible. The platform helped me find the ideal tenant for my apartment in record time. It is easy to use and very efficient.
array-user.description-5: I never thought renting a property could be so simple. Thanks to Reffindr, I have more time to dedicate to other activities because I quickly found the perfect tenant.

modal.confirmation: Are you sure you want to save changes?

data.ask-1: What is Reffindr, and how does it benefit me as a departing tenant?
data.answer-1: Reffindr is a platform that allows you to refer new candidates to occupy the apartment you are vacating. By making a recommendation, you can earn a reduced commission, which can help with moving expenses, while the new tenant benefits from a lower commission compared to a traditional agency.
data.ask-2: How does the process of referring a new tenant work?
data.answer-2: When you decide to leave your apartment, you can recommend a new candidate who meets the owner's requirements or even someone with better qualifications, such as greater job stability or higher income. By doing so, you will receive a commission for the referral.
data.ask-3: Can I recommend anyone, or do they need to meet specific requirements?
data.answer-3: Although you can recommend anyone you deem suitable, it is important that the candidate meets the requirements set by the property owner. These may include conditions such as job stability, sufficient income, and other relevant factors for renting the apartment.
data.ask-4: What happens if the property owner rejects the person I recommended?
data.answer-4: Although you can recommend anyone you deem suitable, it is important that the candidate meets the requirements set by the property owner. These may include conditions such as job stability, sufficient income, and other relevant factors for renting the apartment.

delete-account.title: Delete Account
delete-account.text-1: Are you sure you want to delete the account?
delete-account.text-2: If you delete the account, all your messages and other data in the app will be erased.
